description: Fix Column 3 Width to 40 Cells - Change Column 3 from proportional sizing to a fixed 40-cell width, giving all remaining space to Column 2

userStories.title: Fix Column 3 to 40 cells and give remaining space to Column 2
userStories.description: As a user, I want the stats column to be a consistent fixed width so the layout is predictable and the notes list gets maximum space.
acceptanceCriteria: Col3TargetWidth constant is replaced with Col3Width = 40 in tui/layout/columns.go
Col2TargetWidth constant is removed — Column 2 no longer needs a target, it gets all remaining space
ComputeColumnWidths() treats Column 3 as fixed at 40 cells (like Col1 and Col4), not proportionally distributed
In 3-column layout: col2 = termWidth - Col1Width - Col3Width - borders; col3 = 40
In 4-column layout: col2 = termWidth - Col1Width - Col3Width - Col4Width - borders; col3 = 40
Column 3 hides when Col2 would fall below ColMinWidth (30) — check: usable - Col3Width >= ColMinWidth
Column 2 hides when remaining space after Col1 + borders < ColMinWidth — same as current behaviour
Layout renders correctly at terminal widths: 220, 170, 140, 100, 60
userStories.notes: ComputeColumnWidths is in tui/layout/columns.go. Current constants: Col1Width=30, Col2TargetWidth=80, Col3TargetWidth=60, ColMinWidth=30, Col4Width=30, Col4ShowThreshold=170. Replace proportional distribution logic (lines 49-61) with fixed Col3 + remainder to Col2. The 3-column check changes from 'usable >= ColMinWidth*2' to 'usable - Col3Width >= ColMinWidth' (after giving Col3 its fixed 40, does Col2 still have at least 30?).

userStories.title: Update TUI-ARCHITECTURE.md for fixed Column 3 width
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the architecture doc to reflect that Column 3 is now fixed-width so documentation stays accurate.
acceptanceCriteria: The responsive layout constants list in TUI-ARCHITECTURE.md shows Col3Width = 40 instead of Col3TargetWidth = 60
Col2TargetWidth is removed from the constants list
The ComputeColumnWidths description states Column 3 is fixed at 40 cells
The column sizing table shows 'Col 3 = 40 (fixed)' instead of proportional sizing for all layouts where Col3 is visible
Column 2 description says 'all remaining space' instead of 'target 80'
userStories.notes: TUI-ARCHITECTURE.md is at tui/TUI-ARCHITECTURE.md. The constants are listed around line 98. The column sizing table is around lines 102-108. Update both the constants description and the terminal width breakpoint table.
